DOC.detailed_description: Allocation : Randomized . Subjects randomize one two group : placebo Instaflex Joint Support . Supplements administer double-blinded fashion . Intervention Model : Instaflex Joint Support supplement 8 week versus placebo . Sample Size : N=100 , N=50 per group . Statistical Procedures : 2 x 2 repeat measure analysis variance ( ANOVA ) . Study Duration ( per subject ) : 8 week . Blood sample schedule : Blood draw pre- post-study . Monitoring adverse event : Subjects fill bi-weekly symptom log monitor untoward symptom . Diagnostic chemistry panel measure pre- post-study . Rescue medication : Paracetamol ( i.e. , acetaminophen find Tylenol ) allow rescue medicine pain study need . Subjects record paracetamol usage .
